TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypedList

summary.span: 提供發現可繫結清單的結構描述 (Schema) 的功能，其中可用於繫結的屬性與要繫結物件的公用 (Public) 屬性是不同的。

span.span: Provides functionality to discover the schema for a bindable list, where the properties available for binding differ from the public properties of the object to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用的執行個體，使用此介面物件，表示`customer`資料表中，您想要繫結至屬性`customer`物件表示，不包含屬性的。Use this interface if, for instance, you are using a object that represents a `customer` table, you want to bind to the properties on the `customer` object that the represents, not the properties of the . 此介面不需要設計階段支援可繫結的清單。This interface is not required for design-time support of a bindable list. 繫結至資料可能會發生在執行階段，或在設計工具中，但這兩種規則。Binding to data can occur either at run time or in a designer, but there are rules for both. 在執行階段，您可以繫結至下列其中一項中的資料：At run time, you can bind to data in any of the following: - - 實作器，提供強型別實作器屬性 (也就是是任何內容，不過)。Implementer of , provided the implementer has a strongly typed property (that is, the is anything but ). 您可以進行的預設實作來完成這私用。You can accomplish this by making the default implementation of private. 如果您想要建立所遵循的強類型集合的規則，您應該從衍生。If you want to create an that follows the rules of a strongly typed collection, you should derive from . - 實作器。Implementer of . 您可以在設計工具，來初始化繫結至遵循相同的規則的物件。In a designer, you can initialize binding to objects by following the same rules. 如需有關繫結至資料來源的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information on binding to a data source, see the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作介面。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the interface. 名為泛型型別`SortableBindingList`衍生自類別，並且實作介面。A generic type named `SortableBindingList` derives from the class and implements the interface. 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作 ITypedList 介面](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement the ITypedList Interface](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.ITypedList#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ITypedList/CS/SortableBindingList.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.ITypedList#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ITypedList/VB/SortableBindingList.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetItemProperties(class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor[] listAccessors) cil managed
Public Function GetItemProperties (listAccessors As PropertyDescriptor()) As PropertyDescriptorCollection

param.name: listAccessors
param.span: 要在可繫結集合中尋找的 物件的陣列。

span.span: An array of objects to find in the collection as bindable.

summary.span: 傳回 ，表示使用於繫結資料的每個項目的屬性。

span.span: Returns the that represents the properties on each item used to bind data.

returns.span: ，表示用來繫結資料的每個項目上的屬性。

span.span: The that represents the properties on each item used to bind data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`listAccessors`參數不是`null`，它通常包含屬性描述元可識別要擷取之物件的實作的容器清單。If the `listAccessors` parameter is not `null`, it typically contains a property descriptor that identifies a list of containers to retrieve for the object that implements . 比方說，包含兩個資料表`myCustomers`並`myOrders`，與呼叫它們之間的關聯性`myCustOrders`。For example, a containing two tables, `myCustomers` and `myOrders`, with a relationship between them called `myCustOrders`. 如果您建立若要檢視的物件`myCustomers`，然後呼叫方法`null`傳回的資料行中的屬性描述項`myCustomers`。If you create a object to view `myCustomers`, then calling the method with `null` returns the property descriptors for the columns in `myCustomers`. 如此一來，傳回的屬性描述項的其中一個是屬性描述元`myCustOrders`，則只會為呼叫方法的清單存取子陣列，包含的屬性描述項`myCustOrders`會傳回屬性描述項針對`myOrders`。As a result, one of the returned property descriptors is a property descriptor for `myCustOrders`, just as calling the method with a list accessor array containing the property descriptors for `myCustOrders` will return the property descriptors for `myOrders`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method. 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作 ITypedList 介面](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement the ITypedList Interface](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.ITypedList#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ITypedList/CS/SortableBindingList.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.ITypedList#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ITypedList/VB/SortableBindingList.vb#3)]

param.name: listAccessors

span.span: An array of objects, for which the list name is returned.
Returns the name of the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法使用只在設計階段架構和過時控制項。This method is used only in the design-time framework and by the obsolete control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method. 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作 ITypedList 介面](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement the ITypedList Interface](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md).
